articles.title: Explained: How Saturn Flung Comet A117uUD Out Of The Solar System In 2022 - News18
articles.description: The first comet thrown out of the solar system was Comet C/1980 E1 after encountering Jupiter.
articles.content: Scientists have found that Saturn has thrown Comet A117uUD out of the solar system in 2022. It has been claimed in an Instagram post. As described in the post, this discovery was made by an ATLAS (As… [+1997 chars]

articles.author: David Nield
articles.title: NASA Beamed a Laser Message to Earth From 10 Million Miles Away - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Eventually, we're going to want to expand the World Wide Web across the galaxy, and NASA recently demonstrated a key piece of tech that could help, beaming messages via laser across a distance of almost 16 million kilometers (10 million miles).
articles.content: Eventually, we're going to want to expand the World Wide Web across the galaxy, and NASA recently demonstrated a key piece of tech that could help, beaming messages via laser across a distance of alm… [+3178 chars]
